nodedef.name: NagiosService
nodedef.attr: RUNS a Nagios plugin and returns alerts and metric data when available.

datadef.name: PluginDirectory
datadef.attr: Identifies the directory where the Nagios plugins have been installed.

datadef.name: PluginFilename
datadef.attr: The NAME of the executable files for the Nagios plugin. Available files are displayed in the pick popup.

datadef.name: Arguments
datadef.attr: The arguments that should be passed to the plugin. Run the plugin interactively to determine what arguments are supported.

datadef.name: PushTypes
datadef.attr: Selects which types of responses will generate monitoring events. Choose ALL to get OK status information.

datadef.name: PushMetrics
datadef.attr: If set and metrics are available, metric data will be collected. If the metrics do not follow the Nagios standards, metric data will not be captured.
